H0.text: Sperm and eggs are produced in the process of gametogenesis, of which meiosis is a part.

H1.text: Chromosomes are produced during gametogenesis, a process that includes the meiotic division.

H2.text: Egg only is the product of gametogenesis, a process that includes meiosis.

H3.text: Sperm only is what meiosis produces during gametogenesis.

A4.text: Spermatogenesis, the process of male gamete formation in animals, involves meiosis in a diploid primary spermatocyte to produce haploid spermatozoa.

A5.text: Oogenesis, the process of female gamete formation in animals, involves meiosis (including meiotic recombination) of a diploid primary oocyte to produce a haploid ovum.
